title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 10400.8 - Quorum, Voting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 10400.8 - Quorum, Voting

State Regulations

Eight members of the commission shall constitute a quorum of
the commission and the concurrence of six members of the commission shall be
necessary. Two members of a three-member panel of the commission, as defined in
section 499-e of the Judiciary Law, shall constitute a quorum of the panel and
the concurrence of two members of the panel shall be necessary for any action
taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
10400.8

Adopted

New

York State Register December 18, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 51, eff. 12/18/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
